
# Change log

## [0.3] - 2023-04-20
### Changed
- Use setProxyConfig() API to store authentication information
### Added
- Added an item to specify the ChatGPT model on the plugin settings screen.

## [0.2] - 2023-03-27
### Added
- Added individual prompt settings

## [0.1] - 2023-03-24
- first release

### Added
### Changed
